attributes.action: Allow 12 persons of any race, gender or social standing to be allowed to form the body that decides MP's terms and conditions of employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see 12 ordinary people with the aid of financial and employment experts be allowed to set the terms and conditions of MP's by the time of the next election, housing should be purchased by the Government for MP's to live in whilst in office, those houses maintained by the Government so that MP's are not "tempted" to exceed their allowances ever again, by doing this we will have the people that employ the MP's decide what they are worth, not the other way round.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
